name: Space colonisers (trashydevy)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

Use left and right arrow keys to move the invaders left and right (holding it does not work,  you must click it repetitively)

To move up, head towards the sides (left, right, left, right...)

If you have any questions contact trashydevy on youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC99hbwAM_Ke_2L8V--QXhmw

Have fun :D
